name: Chapter 2: First Contact
short_description: An away team, including Commander Riker, Data, and Troi, boards the Codarian ship. They meet the Codarian leaders and begin to understand the coders' code-centric way of life. However, tensions arise as cultural differences surface.
people: Commander Riker, Data, Deanna Troi, Codarian leaders
from_prev_chapter: The crew decides to send an away team to the Codarian ship.
to_next_chapter: The away team is invited to a Codarian cultural event where they will witness a major coding ceremony.
